metadata.title: CVE-2020-14983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The server in Chocolate Doom 3.0.0 and Crispy Doom 5.8.0 doesn't validatethe user-controlled num_players value, leading to a buffer overflow. Amalicious user can overwrite the server's stack.

criterions.comment: chocolate-doom: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
